cause.description:
Our Mission
The Center's mission is to save young lives, using the best research and treatment available, and exerting the greatest care.
Links: help the Children's Cancer Center in Lebanon: donate through the website: www.cccl.org.lb or contact on: 01/374444 ext: 8138
1. To help these children recover
cause.mission: TO help the children who are suffering from differrent kinds of cancer
